parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  cs.*,
  cf.email,
  cf.nom,
  cf.prenom,
  cf.raison_sociale,
  cf.id as client_id
FROM client_subscriptions cs
JOIN client_finals cf ON cs.client_final_id = cf.id
WHERE cs.id = '{{ $json.subscriptionId }}'::uuid;

=UPDATE client_subscriptions
SET 
  statut = 'suspendu',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.subscription.id }}'::uuid
RETURNING *;

=UPDATE client_finals
SET 
  statut = 'suspendu'
WHERE id = '{{ $node['05. Préparer suspension'].json.clientId }}'::uuid
RETURNING *;

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, message: 'Abonnement suspendu avec succès', data: { subscription: $node['06. Suspendre abonnement'].json[0], client: $node['07. Suspendre accès client'].json[0] } }) }}
={{ JSON.stringify({ success: false, error: 'Abonnement non trouvé' }) }}
